SEARCH
Package com.icx.dom.domain

Annotation Interface DomainAnnotations.SqlColumn

Enclosing class:
DomainAnnotations
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public static @interface DomainAnnotations.SqlColumn
For fields of domain classes which are associated to columns: (Non default) column name, NOT NULL and UNIQUE constraint, text length of column associated with field of a domain class

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    int
    charsize
     
    String
    defaultValue
     
    boolean
    isText
     
    String
    name
     
    boolean
    notNull
     
    boolean
    onDeleteCascade
     
    boolean
    unique
     

  • Element Details

    • name

      String name
      Returns:
      non default name of column in SQL table associated with this field of Java domain class
      Default:
      ""

    • unique

      boolean unique
      Returns:
      true if database table column values must be unique - to define UNIQUE constraint for column
      Default:
      false

    • charsize

      int charsize
      Returns:
      size of character column associated with this (String, enum, List, Map) field (default 256) - to define column size
      Default:
      256

    • isText

      boolean isText
      Returns:
      true if content of (character) column can be treated as SQL text (cannot be used in where clause) - to set TEXT/CLOB data type for column
      Default:
      false

    • notNull

      boolean notNull
      Returns:
      true if database table column may contain null values - to define NULL constraint for column
      Default:
      false

    • defaultValue

      String defaultValue
      Returns:
      default value to set for existing records if non-null column is added after creating table or is modified to NOT NULL in a specific version (version control)
      Default:
      ""

    • onDeleteCascade

      boolean onDeleteCascade
      Returns:
      true if foreign key constraint has 'ON DELETE CASCADE' feature - to force ON DELETE CASCADE on this foreign key
      Default:
      false
